channel.title: (help me)fixing hp lvls
channel.description: hello i was woundering if some one could help me fix my hp lvl problem. the problem is say my hp is lvl 79 and i eat a shark or lobster ect. it should heal me until my hp lvl 79 so its 79 over 79 but if i eat food then it goes 89 over 79 until its eventually 99 over 79 hp i was woundering if someone could help me fix by making it not heal anymore then the persons current hp lvl im sorry if this sounds confusing hopefully one of you people will understand peace! :D p.s. im running testscape[br][size=1]Posted on: February 17, 2007, 10:56:17 PM[/size][hr]ohh by the way if anyone could tell me the skill cape item id's (if there are any) that would also be appreciated

item.title: (help me)fixing hp lvls
item.dc:creator: @undeadscape_owner undeadscape owner
item.description:
@undeadscape_owner wrote:

let me explain it properly maby that will help because i explained it stupidly: ok my hp lvl is lvl 79 i just pked a guy and have 34 hp left from 79 so to top it up i eat a food any so i can get full hp which in my case is lvl 79 i eat shark for example it heals 20 (not accurate) now i have 56 over 79 hp i eat agian 77 over 79 hp i eat agian and now i have 89 over 79 hp i want to know how to make i want it to stop at the currents persons hp lvl sorry im finding it hard to explain

Read full topic

item.title: (help me)fixing hp lvls
item.dc:creator: @_8ballcrazy ~8ballcrazy~
item.description:
@_8ballcrazy wrote:

ok first go into characters file,click on a name, and then go to the bottom itl say skill then like 00 and 000000 change the 00 to the lvl and the 00000 to the xp lvl WARNING:if you put xp that doesnt match the lvl then you will have the character frozen!!!

for the id’s go to the top of the game client then click the ttab help then go to item id’s

hope this helped=)

Read full topic
